metadata.description:
Chuki Chuki and many songs of mine are inspired by music that I would hear at family gatherings as a kid growing up in NYC, so they hit very close to home for me. Chuki Chuki was made in Dec 2022 with Ex Mañana, a friend that I haven't worked with in a while and was excited to get back in the studio with. I told them that I wanted to make a track that was rooted in Merengue but also melds my American knowledge of Hyperpop. Once I heard the dry opening chords, I laid down my hymns and just started having fun with it. It’s not often making a track comes that easily so I knew we had something special.

Being a first-generation Dominican American, I think it’s important for me to pay homage to and spotlight creatives of my culture. The word “Chuki” is derived from the children’s diabolical doll “Chucky” and is used in some Dominican households to describe kids being up to no good. I wanted to make a track about having a night out with my friends so I took the slang word and made it more lighthearted but still mischievous.

lyrics.text:
Salí del trabajo encojona’ 
Toy' buscando una matita pa’ enrollar
La vida esta hecha para disfrutar
La bocina en la esquina esta a lo max

Llamaron a los bomberos
Se encendió
Los llamó la vecina
Se encendió

Llamaron lo bomberos
Se encendió
Los llamó la vecina
Se encendió

Chuki Chuki, ya!
Hoy se sale pa’ beber
Chuki Chuki, ya!
Hoy se sale pa’ beber

Esta noche bebe
Hoy se bebe
Esta noche bebe (wepa)
Esta noche bebe
Hoy se bebe
Esta noche bebe
Hoy se bebe

Mala Maña Mala
El coro es mi paz
Un pasito pa’ ka
Un pasito pa’ ya, ey

Amor para mi opps
Por que la envidia mata
Un pasito pa’ ka
Un pasito pa’ ya

Solo quiero estar metia’ en tigeraje
Hacer cosas que no quieren ver mi padres
El colmado se prendió no sale nadie
El colmado se prendió los popi saben
Ey

La calle en la madrugá
Brilla pa’ mi
Brilla pa’ mi
Los pájaros cantarán 
Por que amanecí
Por que amanecí
No me quiero ir de aquí 
Ir de aqui
Irme nunca

No me quiero ir de aquí 

Chuki Chuki, ya!
Hoy se sale pa’ beber
Chuki Chuki, ya!
Hoy se sale pa’ beber

Esta noche bebe
Hoy se bebe
Esta noche bebe (wepa)
Esta noche bebe
Hoy se bebe
Esta noche bebe
Hoy se bebe

- English Translation -

Verse 1-

Left my job today, annoyed
I’m looking for a lil tree to roll
Life was made to enjoy
The speaker on the corner is on at the max

Pre-

They called the firefighters
It’s lit
The neighbor called em
It’s lit

They called the firefighters
It’s lit
The neighbor called em
It’s lit

Hook-

CHUKI CHUKI YA
Today we go out to drink
CHUKI CHUKI YA
Today we go out to drink

Tonight, baby
Today, we drink
Tonight, baby (wepa)
Tonight, baby
Today, we drink
Tonight, baby
Today, we drink

Verse 2-

Bad habit I guess
The party is my peace
Take a step over here
Take a step over there, hey

Love to my opps
Because envy kills
Take a step over here
Take a step over there

I just want to do hood stuff with my friends
Do things my parents don’t want to see
The party is lit, no one is going to want to leave
The party is lit, the bougies know
Ey

Bridge-

The street in the early morning
Shine for me
Shine for me
Te birds will sing 
Cause I stayed up
Cause I stayed up
I never want to leave
From here
Never leave

I never want to leave from here

Hook-

CHUKI CHUKI YA
Today we go out to drink
CHUKI CHUKI YA
Today we go out to drink

Tonight, baby
Today, we drink
Tonight, baby (wepa)
Tonight, baby
Today, we drink
Tonight, baby
Today, we drink
